question.query: What defi protocols have the best valuation (P/S)?

steps.text:
[
  {
    "type": "text",
    "text": "![Solana protocols ranked by P/S (DeFiLlama snapshot)](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1767412332/veldt/a0fzzqmwuqpzohf9w0fp.jpg)

DeFi “best valuation” on **P/S** is mostly a **short list of high-fee apps priced like they’re dying**. The cleanest lows I’m seeing in Droyd’s recent dataset cluster on **Solana consumer/DEX/perps** plus a few “DeFi bank” names on Ethereum.

## Lowest P/S I can point to (actionable + repeatedly cited)

- **ORE Protocol** — **~0.7x–1.05x P/S** (multiple snapshots cite it as the #1 cheapest on Solana by P/S). Key caveat: the market is pricing in “something’s off” risk; treat as deep value with hidden tail risk.
- **Adrena (ADEN)** — **~1.27x P/S**. Perp/derivatives exposure at a “this shouldn’t be public” multiple if revenues are durable.
- **Meteora (MET)** — **~1.62x P/S**. Consistently flagged as mispriced vs peers; one claim: **~4x Raydium revenue while trading at ~50% of Raydium FDV**.
- **Sky (Maker successor)** — **~2.6x–7.8x P/S** depending on snapshot/timeframe; repeatedly framed as a profitable “DeFi bank” trading at a discount to both DeFi and TradFi comps.
- **Raydium (RAY)** — **~3.0x P/S** in one comparison table (cheap relative to many majors, but not “best” vs the Solana micro/low-teen names).
- **Pump.fun** — shows up with **low single-digit to mid-single-digit P/S** depending on snapshot methodology; not “DeFi” pure-play, but it’s one of the most obviously cash-flowing onchain businesses.

![FDV vs annualized fees and P/S for major tokens](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1756415764/veldt/kjcft5qfcexpmfqunx1a.jpg)

## Majors that are *not* “best P/S” (still relevant comps)
- **Uniswap** — **~9.8x P/S** (reasonable for a mega-cap quality asset, not “cheapest”).
- **Aerodrome** — **~9.3x P/S**.
- **Jupiter** — **~30x P/S** in the same snapshot (priced for growth).
- **Hyperliquid** — **~40–57x P/S** across snapshots (market already paying up for dominance + buyback meta).

If you want this as a screen: **P/S < 5** tends to be where the real anomalies are (ORE/Adrena/Meteora/Sky/Raydium/Pump), and the next tier is **5–12** where “quality at a discount” lives (Sky/Uni/Aero depending on day).",
    "providerMetadata": {
      "openai": {
        "itemId": "msg_04d716e0b3c858f3006966b99285508194b85c86e5039c2dc9"
      }
    }
  }
]

agentResult.finalAnswer:
![Solana protocols ranked by P/S (DeFiLlama snapshot)](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1767412332/veldt/a0fzzqmwuqpzohf9w0fp.jpg)

DeFi “best valuation” on **P/S** is mostly a **short list of high-fee apps priced like they’re dying**. The cleanest lows I’m seeing in Droyd’s recent dataset cluster on **Solana consumer/DEX/perps** plus a few “DeFi bank” names on Ethereum.

## Lowest P/S I can point to (actionable + repeatedly cited)

- **ORE Protocol** — **~0.7x–1.05x P/S** (multiple snapshots cite it as the #1 cheapest on Solana by P/S). Key caveat: the market is pricing in “something’s off” risk; treat as deep value with hidden tail risk.
- **Adrena (ADEN)** — **~1.27x P/S**. Perp/derivatives exposure at a “this shouldn’t be public” multiple if revenues are durable.
- **Meteora (MET)** — **~1.62x P/S**. Consistently flagged as mispriced vs peers; one claim: **~4x Raydium revenue while trading at ~50% of Raydium FDV**.
- **Sky (Maker successor)** — **~2.6x–7.8x P/S** depending on snapshot/timeframe; repeatedly framed as a profitable “DeFi bank” trading at a discount to both DeFi and TradFi comps.
- **Raydium (RAY)** — **~3.0x P/S** in one comparison table (cheap relative to many majors, but not “best” vs the Solana micro/low-teen names).
- **Pump.fun** — shows up with **low single-digit to mid-single-digit P/S** depending on snapshot methodology; not “DeFi” pure-play, but it’s one of the most obviously cash-flowing onchain businesses.

![FDV vs annualized fees and P/S for major tokens](https://res.cloudinary.com/dgjriemfd/image/upload/v1756415764/veldt/kjcft5qfcexpmfqunx1a.jpg)

## Majors that are *not* “best P/S” (still relevant comps)
- **Uniswap** — **~9.8x P/S** (reasonable for a mega-cap quality asset, not “cheapest”).
- **Aerodrome** — **~9.3x P/S**.
- **Jupiter** — **~30x P/S** in the same snapshot (priced for growth).
- **Hyperliquid** — **~40–57x P/S** across snapshots (market already paying up for dominance + buyback meta).

If you want this as a screen: **P/S < 5** tends to be where the real anomalies are (ORE/Adrena/Meteora/Sky/Raydium/Pump), and the next tier is **5–12** where “quality at a discount” lives (Sky/Uni/Aero depending on day).

parameters.semantic_query: protocol valuation P/S price to sales best DeFi protocols undervalued

standardAgentConfig.instructions:
Role: crypto research assistant

        Tools: 'webSearch'

        Utilize web search capabilities to find accurate, current information about crypto projects, trends, and markets.
